trans-unit.source: Represents a segment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa um segmento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from PathSegment, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, represent specific types of geometric segments.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de PathSegment, como <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, representam tipos específicos de segmentos geométricos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because PathSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Recursos Freezable:** porque objetos PathSegment herdam o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, eles fornecem vários recursos especiais: eles podem ser declarados como, compartilhados entre vários objetos, somente leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonados e tornados thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os diferentes recursos que são fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> fazendo cópias profundas de seus valores.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para produzir cópias modificáveis de somente leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse método copia as propriedades de dependência, ele copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso embora eles não podem resolver.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ele não copie animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia profunda modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> retorna de propriedade do objeto clonado <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se o <> </> *> é de propriedade da fonte<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> objeto fazendo cópias profundas de seus valores.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não copiar referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações, embora ele copia os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para produzir cópias modificáveis de somente leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia profunda modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se o <> </> *> é de propriedade da fonte de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is treated as a corner when it is stroked with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a junção entre esse <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e anterior <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> é tratado como um canto quando ele é traçado com um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is not to be treated as a corner; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a junção entre esse <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e anterior <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> não deve ser tratado como um canto; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the segment is stroked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o segmento é traçado.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object has this property set to `true`, that object contributes to the stroked area of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> when rendered by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objeto tem essa propriedade definida como `true`, esse objeto contribui para a área traçada de <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>quando processado por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the extra area added by a Pen affects hit testing and explicit operations to widen the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `true`, a área extra adicionada por afeta uma caneta ocorrências operações de teste e explícitas para ampliar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: When you switch between stroked and non-stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> sections in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, it is considered the same as the dashes of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alterna entre traçadas e não traçados <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>seções em um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>ele é considerado o mesmo que os traços de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> object determines the shape of the ends of stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>objeto determina a forma das extremidades do traçadas <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the segment is stroked when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, the segment is not stroked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o segmento é traçado quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> é usado para renderizar o segmento; caso contrário, o segmento não é traçado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
